mapper.select: SELECT CD.CONTRACT_DETAIL_NO, CD.CONTRACT_NO, CD.ITEM_CODE, CD.ITEM_NAME , CD.UNIT_OF_CONTRACT, CD.DUE_DATE_OF_CONTRACT, CD.CONTRACT_AMOUNT , CD.UNIT_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT, CD.SUM_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT , CD.MPS_APPLY_STATUS, CD.DELIVERY_STATUS, CD.DESCRIPTION FROM CONTRACT C, CONTRACT_DETAIL CD WHERE C.CONTRACT_NO = CD.CONTRACT_NO AND C.CONTRACT_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
